title: 249. Q&AF: Recognizing Burnout, Rewarding Employees & 3 Great Habits
itunes:title: 249. Q&AF: Recognizing Burnout, Rewarding Employees & 3 Great Habits
description: In today's episode, Andy answers your questions on how you can recognize burnout in your performance & adjust accordingly, when's a good time to recognize & reward your employees for their hard work, and the top three best habits you could build during these uncertain times.
content:encoded: In today's episode, Andy answers your questions on how you can recognize burnout in your performance & adjust accordingly, when's a good time to recognize & reward your employees for their hard work, and the top three best habits you could build during these uncertain times.
